1_14GeFTj8h85EgnWpS4LPJr5eMrjpKH1e5S.body: It can do whatever you want. It's a network that uses the bittorrent protocol to host sites. You can make your own site, you can download from other people, you can upload stuff if you have a site that allows it. It's just a network that uses the bittorrent protocol. It's just like the real web but peer to peer hosting so its free.

On March 26, 2017 the biggest anti-government protests since 2011-2012 broke out across Russia.
